ðŸ“– Summary: Pixie is a lightweight Java library designed to streamline object creation and configuration. It offers dependency injection, configuration management, and event handling capabilities within a small 100k jar. Pixie utilizes constructor injection with annotations and can be configured via properties files or a fluent builder API.
